Title: Primary Colors
Actors: John Travolta, Emma Thompson, Billy Bob Thornton, Kathy Bates
Plot: Jack Stanton is running for president. The election is seen through the eyes of young Henry Burton. Along the way Stanton must deal with a sex scandal.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 29 nominations.
Production: Icarus Films, Universal Pictures, Award Entertainment, Mutual Film Company
